mapper.select: SELECT od.id AS id, om.id AS member_id, m.id AS Member_ID, od.WORK_ID, od.OPTION_ID, od.TOTAL_PRICE, od.EVENT_WORK_SALE, od.EVENT_PERIOD_SALE, od.order_member_id, (od.TOTAL_PRICE - od.EVENT_WORK_SALE - od.EVENT_PERIOD_SALE) AS FINAL_PRICE, m.member_name, w.work_name, om.order_date, om.order_status FROM Order_Member om JOIN Order_Detail od ON od.ORDER_MEMBER_ID = om.id JOIN Member m ON om.MEMBER_ID = m.id JOIN Work w ON od.work_id = w.id ORDER BY om.order_status ASC, om.order_date DESC

SELECT od.id AS id, od.order_member_id, od.final_price, d.id as delivery_id, m.member_name, om.order_date, om.order_status, om.member_id, om.delivery_name, om.delivery_road, om.delivery_address, om.delivery_phone, w.work_name FROM Order_Detail od JOIN Order_Member om ON od.order_member_id = om.id Join Work w ON w.id = od.work_id JOIN Member m ON om.member_id = m.id JOIN Delivery d ON om.delivery_id = d.id WHERE od.id = #{id}

SELECT om.id, om.member_id, om.order_date, om.order_status, om.delivery_name, om.delivery_road, d.id as delivery_id, od.order_member_id, od.id AS order_detail_id, od.work_id, od.option_id, od.total_price, od.event_work_sale, od.event_period_sale, od.final_price FROM Order_Member om JOIN Order_Detail od ON om.id = od.order_member_id JOIN Delivery d ON om.delivery_id = d.id WHERE member_id = #{id} ORDER BY om.order_status asc, om.order_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE Order_Member SET order_status = #{orderStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT om.* FROM Order_Member om JOIN Order_Detail od ON om.id = od.order_member_id
